title: Mieng Scallop (4 Pcs)
subtitle: Grilled scallop with roasted coconut shredded, lime, Spanish onion, peanut, ginger and fried shrimp served on betel leaf and palm sugar herbs relish.

title: Hoy Jor (4 Pcs)
subtitle: Crab meat, prawn, pork mince and water chestnut wrapped with soya paper then deep fried served with plum sauce.

title: Crystal Prawn (3 Pcs)
subtitle: Fresh whole local prawn cutlet with marinated pork mince and Thai herbs wrapped in rice pastry and deep fried until crisp and golden served with sweet chilli sauce.

title: Satay (4 Pcs)
subtitle: Sliced chicken marinated with special Thai spices and BBQ on skewers served with homemade peanut sauce.

title: Curry Puff (4 Pcs)
subtitle: Minced Pork mixed with potato, curry powder wrapped in pastry and deep fried served with sweet cucumber salad sauce.

title: Vegetarian Spring Roll (4 Pcs)
subtitle: Deep fried Thai style vegetable spring roll served with plum sauce.

title: Taw Hu Tod (6 Pcs)
subtitle: Deep fried bean curd with a crispy outside and soft center served with sweet chilli crushed peanut sauce.

title: Garlic Quail
subtitle: Marinated in garlic, black pepper and herbs then deep fried and served with sweet chilli sauce.

title: Crispy Squid
subtitle: Crispy squid sprinkle with sea salt pepper and mixed herbs, served with mild sweet chilli lime soy sauce.

title: Mixed Entree (Serves 2)
subtitle: Hoy Jor, Satay, Vegetarian Spring Roll, Curry Puffs served with chefs selection of sauces.

title: Tom Yum
subtitle: Spicy and sour soup with mushroom and fresh Thai herbs.

title: Tom Kah
subtitle: Spicy and sour soup with mushroom, fresh Thai herbs and coconut milk.

title: Green Curry
subtitle: Spicy green curry, bamboo shoot, French bean, coconut milk and basil.

title: Red Curry
subtitle: Spicy red curry, bamboo shoot, French bean, coconut milk and basil.

title: Panang Curry
subtitle: Lightly sweet red chilli curry with coconut milk and kaffir lime leaf served on steamed broccoli.

title: Red Curry Duck
subtitle: Sliced of roasted breast duck set in homemade red curry with pineapple, cherry tomato, basil and coconut milk.

title: Coco Prawn
subtitle: Fresh local king prawns set in aromic green curry, lightly flavoured with fresh young coconut granted flesh, served in fresh young coconut.

title: Roti Duck
subtitle: Red dried curry with roasted duck breast fillet, coconut milk, kaffir lime leaf served with crispy roti and cucumber salad sauce.

title: Yang Chicken
subtitle: Char grilled marinated chicken served with homemade sweet chili sauce

title: Beef Salad
